title: (1) Burg Klopp, Bingen and the Bridge over the Nahe, as Seen from the Rhine; (2) View up the Rhine to Burg Ehrenfels; (3)-(7) Composition Studies, (7) Showing the Bridge and Abbey at Bingen; (8) View down the Rhine from just above Eltville
credits: Accepted by the nation as part of the Turner Bequest 1856
